description: In the heart of the Mediterranean, a series of mysterious thefts have left the local art community in disarray. As whispers of a shadowy figure circulate, you must navigate through the vibrant streets of three cities, piecing together clues that intertwine art, culture, and deception. The trail leads you to a final confrontation in a city known for its ancient ruins and modern art scene.
